party.status: The status of this entry - is it Standard/nonStandrd

correlation.correlationParty: Name of the party that uses a correlative circumscription

correlationReference.correlationAuthor: Author of the reference cited by the citation of the correlating circumscription
correlationReference.correlationDateEntered: Date inwhich the correlating reference was entered
correlationReference.correlationCitation: Information about the reference citation of the correlating circumscription

correlationName.correlationSymbol: Symbol refering to the name of the plant which correlates
correlationName.correlationGenus: Genus name of the plant that correlates
correlationName.correlationSpecies: Species name of the plant that correlates

correlation.congruence: Type of correlation between the plants (eg. subset, superset, equality, intersection
